title: How Objects Are Represented
description: In this lab, you will explore how objects are represented, understand attribute assignment and lookup, and learn about the role of a class definition.

meta.title: Representation of Objects in Python
meta.description: Learn how objects are represented in Python and understand the role of class definitions.
meta.keywords: attribute assignment, python, object representation, class definition, attribute lookup

verify.name: Verify Python Class and Function Definitions
verify.hint: Please define the 'SimpleStock' class and create a few instance objects.

verify.name: Verify Python __dict__ Usage in History
verify.hint: Please inspect the underlying dictionaries of the instances you have created

verify.name: Verify Use of __dict__ Attribute in Python History
verify.hint: Please add the 'time' attribute to the '__dict__' object.

verify.name: Verify Python History for __class__ and __dict__ Usage
verify.hint: Please execute the python code in step 4.

i18n.title: 对象如何表示
i18n.description: 在本实验中，你将探索对象如何被表示，理解属性赋值和查找，并了解类定义的作用。

meta.title: Python 中对象的表示
meta.description: 了解 Python 中对象如何被表示，并理解类定义的作用。
meta.keywords: 属性赋值, Python, 对象表示, 类定义, 属性查找
